name: Bob, The Robot
description:
The web version couldn't be available because Unity's WebGL builds are not working properly together with Universal Render Pipeline. We've tried to work around but without success. If you would like to play out game we have a Windows version to download down below. 

Bob, the robot.

Meet bob the robot, a protoype of self-sufficient robot that is capable of recharge his own battery by simply rewinding your movements. It's like real life ctrl + z!
Join it to test this revolutionary mechanism by reaching the objective of each level.

Controls:

A/D : Movement

Space: Jump

P: Rewind

R: Reset Level

A game created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme Rewind!

All code, art and sound effects made by: Adrieldf and TiagoCastilhos

Background music is from Mooph. (check his channel: Youtube)
